text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium erythromellis is an anamorph species of the genus of Penicillium.
text.Further reading:
Rupérez, P.; Leal, J. A. (1986). "Age-related changes in Penicillium erythromellis cell wall". Transactions of the British Mycological Society. 86 (2): 279. doi:10.1016/S0007-1536(86)80157-7.
Rupérez, P.; Gómez-Miranda, B.; Leal, J. A. (1983). "Extracellular β-malonoglucan from Penicillium erythromellis". Transactions of the British Mycological Society. 80 (2): 313. doi:10.1016/S0007-1536(83)80015-1.
Frisvad (1998). Chemical Fungal Taxonomy. CRC Press. ISBN 0824700694.
